DOC.brief_summary: Videolaryngoscopes become widely use . The aim study compare McGrath Mac videolaryngoscope conventional MacIntosh laryngoscope patient without know risk difficult mask ventilation tracheal intubation .
DOC.brief_title: McGrath Mac VideoLaryngoscope v Macintosh Laryngoscope
DOC.criteria: patient schedule general anesthesia orotracheal intubation predictable risk difficult mask ventilation difficult tracheal intubation necessity rapid sequence induction contraindication sufentanil , propofol , atracurium ENT , thoracic surgery , intracranial surgery
